name: Jonas Goes Boom
description:
This is a game where you have to stop Jonas from going boom. Everyone has turned dum and you have to get Jonas out of this city or he will go boom. Red people are Jonas fans and their brain blows after 5 seconds of seeing you. This game has been tested with mouse, keyboard and switch pro controller. To win you got to get to the sewers. Find the sewer "right" cover to win.

Controls:

Pro controller:

L-Stick - move player.

R-Stick - move camera.

B - fire bomb out of head.

Keyboard and Mouse:

WASD or Arrow Keys - move player.

Mouse - move camera.

Left Click - fire bomb out of head.

I hope you like this game! This is my second game jam and second game released on itch.io. I had lots of fun making this over the weekend. Please follow my itch.io account and comment below. Thanks! 😁
